title: Christina, Queen of Sweden
summary: Christina (Swedish: Kristina, Swedish pronunciation: [krɪ²stiːna]; 18 December 1626 – 19 April 1689), a member of the House of Vasa, was Queen of Sweden from 1632 until her abdication in 1654.[lower-alpha 1] She succeeded her father Gustavus Adolphus upon his death at the Battle of Lützen, but began ruling the Swedish Empire when she reached the age of eighteen in 1644.[7]
